subject: Re: [junit] Static Var Appears Null Inside Test Case
msgSnippet: Dave, Reexamining your code showed that my last answer was wrong regarding main() never being called in the test. Sorry for that. What you do is to hard-wire
messageBody:
Dave,

Reexamining your code showed that my last answer was wrong regarding
main() never being called in the test. Sorry for that. What you do is to
hard-wire the test runner in your app. Do it the other way round as I
described in the last mail; that way you have no dependencies from your
app to the test code but only vice versa.

Johannes
